casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. JOSEPH J. FARRICIELLI STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. HAMDEN SALVAGE, INC. STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. HAMDEN SAND AND STONE, INC. STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. TIRE SALVAGE, INC. Maureen O’Doherty, in support of the petition. Decided November 6, 2002

BORDEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
